slides.title: Forest & Wildlife
slides.content:
**Forest Types:**
- Tropical Rainforest
- Deciduous Forest
- Coniferous Forest
- Mangrove Forest

**Wildlife:**
- National Animal: Tiger
- National Bird: Peacock
- National Parks: Jim Corbett, Kaziranga, Gir

**Conservation:**
- Project Tiger (1973)
- Wildlife Protection Act (1972)
